CALIBRATION
===================================================
Based on camera calibration in Matlab, 2018

***not 100% sure this is correct, must double-check calibration file, it seems different than what is listed above.

A_Mat = np.array([[3876.05658615236,0,0],[0,3895.72930299343,0],[1913.44438724644,1371.72465447568,1]])
A = A_Mat.T
k1 = -0.103855357514449
k2 = 0.0917758599801266
p1 = 0
p2 = 0
k3 = 0
distCoeff = np.array([k1,k2,p1,p2,k3])


** alternative calibration based on numbers (old numbers)
A_Mat = np.array([[3199.56627374271,0,0],[0,3223.07866027237,0],[1990.65253126726,1338.54968536735,1]])
A = A_Mat.T
k1 = -0.178348466805317
k2 = 0.121419906711751
p1 = 0
p2 = 0
k3 = 0
